column4: I have 4 gigs of RAM... I have 1 gig of swap... swap hasn't been touched in all the time I've had Hardy running
4G of RAM, you don't even need swap lol
I have... on all 4 desktop spaces... about 20 or 30 things running. It just doesn't seem to need swap for teh stuff I do.... and that can be different for different people I'm sure
unless you're using some real memory intense applications
